thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 29 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-China Putian Food Says ‍Partners To Establish Fund

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Putian Food Says ‍Partners To Establish Fund

organizations.name: brief-china putian food says ‍partners to establish fund

text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - China Putian Food Holding Ltd:
* ‍PARTNERS TO ESTABLISH FUND, TOTAL AMOUNT OF CAPITAL COMMITMENT OF ALL PARTNERS TO FUND RMB200 MILLION
* ‍CAPITAL COMMITMENT OF CO TO FUND WOULD BE RMB30 MILLION * ‍COMPANY, XINYI INVESTMENT, JICAI FUND AND XINYI HOLDINGS ENTERED INTO PARTNERSHIP AGREEMENT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
